bug.short_desc: Committing a preëdit with Enter or Return behaves badly when the cursor is not at the end of the preëdit
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Committing a preëdit with Return or Enter commits the complete preëdit and forwards the Return or Enter to the application afterwards.
For example, if the preëdit looks like “wo|rd” (where “|” marks the positon of the cursor), committing with Return sends “word” + Return the application.
But sending “wo” + Return + “rd” to the application would be much more natural behaviour.
